mapper.select: SELECT r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.sort, r.data_scope, r.status, r.create_by, r.create_time, r.update_by, r.update_time, r.del_flag, r.remark FROM sys_user_role ur INNER JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.status = '0' AND r.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY r.sort
